title: Out-of-distribution Rumor Detection via Test-Time Adaptation
abstract: arXiv:2403.17735v1 Announce Type: new  Abstract: Due to the rapid spread of rumors on social media, rumor detection has become an extremely important challenge. Existing methods for rumor detection have achieved good performance, as they have collected enough corpus from the same data distribution for model training. However, significant distribution shifts between the training data and real-world test data occur due to differences in news topics, social media platforms, languages and the variance in propagation scale caused by news popularity. This leads to a substantial decline in the performance of these existing methods in Out-Of-Distribution (OOD) situations. To address this problem, we propose a simple and efficient method named Test-time Adaptation for Rumor Detection under distribution shifts (TARD). translated_title: 通过测试时适应进行越界谣言检测
translated_abstract: 由于谣言在社交媒体上的迅速传播，谣言检测已经成为一个极其重要的挑战。现有的谣言检测方法取得了良好的性能，因为它们已经从相同数据分布中收集了足够的语料库进行模型训练。然而，由于新闻主题、社交媒体平台、语言之间的差异以及由新闻热度引起的传播规模的差异，训练数据和真实世界测试数据之间发生了显著的分布变化。这导致了这些现有方法在越界（OOD）情况下性能显著下降。为了解决这个问题，我们提出了一种名为测试时适应（TARD）的简单而高效的方法，用于在分布转移下进行谣言检测。该方法将新闻的传播建模为一个传播图，并构建传播图测试时适应框架，增强模型的适应性和鲁棒性。
tldr: 提出了一种名为测试时适应的方法，用于在分布转移下进行谣言检测，通过建模传播图和构建测试时适应框架，增强模型的适应性和鲁棒性。
en_tdlr: Proposed an approach called Test-time Adaptation for rumor detection under distribution shifts aiming to enhance model adaptability and robustness by modeling propagation graphs and building a test-time adaptation framework.
